description: He penned more than 20 novels, plays and essays which won a number of awards at home and abroad.
title: Per Olov Enquist: Swedish author dies at the age of 85
title_page: Per Olov Enquist: Swedish author dies at the age of 85 - BBC News
maintext: The Visit of the Royal Physician - which won Sweden's top literary honour in 1999, the August Prize - earned him broad international acclaim. It tells the story of a romance between the physician of the mad Danish King Christian VII and the queen, youngest sister of George III of England.
